title: Please Don't Bring Any Food To The Cookout
itunes:title: Please Don't Bring Any Food To The Cookout
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old entrepreneur and I need your advice because Labor Day is coming soon. I live in a nice big neighborhood and I’m friends with everyone on my block. We’re a close-knit community and each year, we have a community outing for Labor Day at the neighborhood clubhouse. Last year, I took 2 big watermelons, ice and 2 cases of soda. Since I’m a bachelor, I’m not expected to do much more than that. We send around a checklist annually so we’ll know who’s bringing what, to the party.....................

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I’m a 33 year old entrepreneur and I need your advice because Labor Day is coming soon. I live in a nice big neighborhood and I’m friends with everyone on my block. We’re a close-knit community and each year, we have a community outing for Labor Day at the neighborhood clubhouse. Last year, I took 2 big watermelons, ice and 2 cases of soda. Since I’m a bachelor, I’m not expected to do much more than that. We send around a checklist annually so we’ll know who’s bringing what, to the party.....................
